Line.Name: Player
Line.Content: Dear Cacique. I got a letter for you.

Line.Name: The Cacique
Line.Content: My dear traveler. Orcs are strong but we are not smart. We used to follow what people told us, but when they have different thoughts, we got confused.

Line.Name: The Cacique
Line.Content: We don't know who is right. So you can make the decision for us. Give this scepter to whoever you believe.

Line.Name: The Cacique
Line.Content: But my dear traveler, I don't want to see this war keeps going on. I think their God Sofia may have the answer.

Line.Name: The Cacique
Line.Content: So, please. Before you talk to their leaders, find the clergy first. Ask them if there is a way to end this war peacefully. Thank you.
